name: Starlight Acres
summary: Starlight Acres is a Terraforming-Farming game for iPhone and iPad. In Starlight Acres, the player has to take care of a herd of animals that find themselves on a planet they are not used to. By utilizing base building, farming, altering the environment, and genetic modification, the player must change the planet to match the animals' needs so that they can survive and reproduce. Starlight Acres is a calm and friendly resource management game based on actual Terraforming science (gamified and sped up of course).
